title: 820-3115 slow charging
message:
Hello Everybody

Working on A1278 820-3115 with slow charging problem ( System says 10 hours for charging time). SMBUS_BATT_SDA is surging 3.4v to 3.1 v , SMBUS_BATT_SCL is surging 3.4v to 3.3.

tested known good battery and magsafe board. Disconnected  BIL CONNECTOR

Replaced SMC,U7000,r5280,r5281,Q7055,R7051,R7052 nothing changed :( 

Any idea for next step check?

Thanks

title: 820-3115 slow charging
message: Measure resistance between pins 17/18 27/28 on U7000. Using a known good 60W or 85W charger?

title: 820-3115 slow charging
message:
[USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER] 17/18 resistance is 4ohm, 27/28 is 22ohm.
and tried 2 different charger. 
Note: all time plugged charger machine turn on also battery connected (its should be only one time when battery disconnect and pluged again machine)

title: 820-3115 slow charging
message: Does the machine power on from battery alone? Was this liquid damage?

title: 820-3115 slow charging
message: Yes [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]  machine starting from battery and working but only slow charging problem and yes few months ago replaced keyboard from liquid damage :(
